ViolentNpcDeathCallback - Interface in ca.techgarage.scrubians.events
Event callback for when a violent NPC dies Other mods can register listeners to be notified when violent NPCs are killed Example usage in another mod: ViolentNpcDeathCallback.EVENT.register((world, entity, npcId, name, entityType, damageSource) -> { // Your custom logic here System.out.println("Violent NPC " + name + " (ID: " + npcId + ") was killed!"); });
ViolentNpcEntity - Class in ca.techgarage.scrubians.npcs.violent
Server-side only violent NPC spawner Uses vanilla entity types so no client-side mod is required Marks entities with NBT data to track them
